title: Australia: per forza e per amore
creator_contributor_role: FILEF - Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families, co-ordinator
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
abstract: A personal story of migrant experience by Giovanni Sgro
description: Giovanni was working on an olive farm as a teenager when he was suddenly called home - he was leaving for Australia in 2 hours! In this story he tells of his life since that day and how he became a political figure in his new homeland. Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006194; Racconti: La Voce del popolo = The Voice of the people; Active; 2003
